name: bonusprojecttaskmanager
description: MEAN / MERN Stack Assignment PART 1: Create a form to save & edit task in database • Create components to create & edit task • TASK Schema o Title (text) o Description (text) o Status (ENUM [Open, In-Progress, Completed]) o Datetime stamp (timestamp) • RESTful API to create and edit task. • Integrate the frontend and backend.
